name: Jamal BYRD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Byrd v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Jamal BYRD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of August, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED, without prejudice to any right Appellant may have, pursuant to Fajohn v. Com., Dep’t of Corrections, 547 Pa. 649, 692 A.2d 1067 (1997), to seek modification of his sentence nunc pro tunc in the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Vincent R. Mazeski, PA Department of Corrections, Office of Chief Counsel, for Pennsylvania Department of Corrections.
casebody.head_matter:
97 A.3d 1200
Jamal BYRD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 18, 2014.
Jamal Byrd, pro se.
Vincent R. Mazeski, PA Department of Corrections, Office of Chief Counsel, for Pennsylvania Department of Corrections.
